CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( CCE_Portfolio__c , "IPRO-1") , "IPro Media In House Lease File", IF(ISPICKVAL( CCE_Portfolio__c , "TSB-1") , "TSB Master Lease Portfolio", IF(ISPICKVAL( CCE_Portfolio__c , "GA-019130-0000") , "Great America Standard/TSP Lease Portfolio", IF(ISPICKVAL( CCE_Portfolio__c , "GA-019130-0001") , "Great America AnyWare Portfolio", IF(ISPICKVAL( CCE_Portfolio__c , "WF-207778.0000") , "Wells Fargo Standard Lease Portfolio", IF(ISPICKVAL( CCE_Portfolio__c , "MTL-1") , "Mitel Standard/TSP Lease Portfolio", "None"))))))
CustomField.label: CCE Portfolio Description
